item.title: Simple Registry
item.description: This function has been removed in Dubbo 2.7, please select other registry for migration. The Simple registry itself is an ordinary Dubbo service, which can reduce third-party dependencies and make the overall communication method consistent. configuration Expose the Simple registry as a Dubbo service: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:dubbo="http://dubbo.apache.org/schema/dubbo" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans-4.3.xsd http://dubbo.apache.org/schema /dubbo http://dubbo.apache.org/schema/dubbo/dubbo.xsd"> <!-- Current application information configuration --> <dubbo:application name="simple-registry" /> <!-- Expose service protocol configuration --> <dubbo:protocol port="9090" /> <!
